    window.fbAsyncInit = function() {
        FB.init({
            appId      : '149930111837309',
            xfbml      : true,
            version    : 'v2.6'
        });
        FB.Event.subscribe('message.send', function (targetUrl) {
            _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'facebook', 'send', targetUrl]);
        });
    };

    (function(d, s, id){
        var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
        if (d.getElementById(id)) {return;}
        js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
        js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js";
        fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
    }(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));
</script>

                                    <li class="dropdown yamm-fw ">
                                                                            <a data-toggle="dropdown" class="dropdown-toggle" aria-expanded="false">Ceasuri</a>
                                    
                                    <div class="dropdown-menu">
                                        <div class="row yamm-content grid">

    var z="";function verify(a,b,c,d){b=b.replace(/|-|./gi,"");var e=new RegExp("\s","g");b=b.replace(e,"");if(!z.closed&amp;&amp;z.location){z.location.href=encodeUrl(a)}else{z=window.open(encodeUrl(a),b,"location=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, toolbar=no, menubar=no, width="+c+", height="+d);if(!z.opener)z.opener=self}if(window.focus){z.focus()}}function encodeUrl(a){if(a.indexOf("?")&gt;0){encodedParams="?";parts=a.split("?");params=parts[1].split("&amp;");for(i=0;i&lt;params.length;i++){if(i&gt;0){encodedParams+="&amp;"}if(params[i].indexOf("=")&gt;0){p=params[i].split("=");encodedParams+=(p[0]+"="+escape(encodeURI(p[1])))}else{encodedParams+=params[i]}}a=parts[0]+encodedParams}return a}

    <script type="text/javascript">
        function getCookie(c_name){
            var c_value = document.cookie;
            var c_start = c_value.indexOf(" " + c_name + "=");
            if (c_start == -1){ c_start = c_value.indexOf(c_name + "=");}
            if (c_start == -1){ c_value = null; } else { c_start = c_value.indexOf("=", c_start) + 1; var c_end = c_value.indexOf(";", c_start); if (c_end == -1) {c_end = c_value.length;} c_value = unescape(c_value.substring(c_start,c_end));}
            return c_value;
        }
